title: Are the Tamil Nadu board history books available? - Quora

response.answer_text: yaa. the tamil nadu state board history books are available. you can easilty download from web sites as soft copy and also you may search from old book stores. i dont know where are you resident from. but old books stores in Madurai Pudhu mandapam, opposite to kishkinta, near to Thanga regal theatre. you can get it. also from triplicane near big street so many old books stores are available.
yes Ofc u can download any textbook online from Government of Tamil Nadu, India
